modules.description: Encodes and decodes values using a predefined set of codec identifiers, mapping between numeric codes and their corresponding representations. Works with integers, strings, and custom data types representing codec definitions. Used to serialize and deserialize data in protocols requiring standardized encoding, such as IPFS-compatible address formats.

The module offers encoding and decoding operations between integer codes and specialized data types such as CIDs, multihashes, network protocols (e.g., libp2p), and cryptographic identifiers, enabling structured data representation. It supports string serialization and deserialization for formats like filecoin, holochain, and IPLD, facilitating data interchange in distributed systems. Specific use cases include protocol interoperability, data storage optimization, and network communication where precise type conversion is critical.
